programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Dark Star
programme.desc: In the mid-22nd century, mankind has begun to colonize interstellar space. Armed with artificially intelligent Thermostellar Triggering Devices, which can talk and reason, the scout ship Dark Star searches for "unstable planets" which might threaten future colonization. Twenty years into its mission, the Dark Star has aged and suffers frequent malfunctions. Commanding officer Powell has died in one such event, but remains aboard in cryogenic suspension. Lieutenant Doolittle, a former surfer from Malibu, has taken over as commander. The tedium of their work has driven the crew of Pinback, Boiler, and Talby "around the bend", so they have created distractions for themselves. Duration: 7200

programme.title: I Married a Monster from Outer Space
programme.desc: One of their first victims is a young man, whose new wife soon realizes something is wrong with him. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel News Starbase Update...and more
programme.desc: Space Channel News with continuing coverage of the SpaceX Starship program. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Slow Space
programme.desc: Space Channel F.A.S.T. goes slow to enjoy the view as we journey through the cosmos on a starship made of sound Duration: 5400

programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Cinespace Marathon
programme.desc: Cinespace is a short film competition that offers filmmakers, editors and animators. around the world a chance to share their works inspired by and using actual NASA imagery. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Day of the Triffids
programme.desc: An unusual meteor shower has left most of the human population blind. A merchant navy officer must find a way to conquer tall, aggressive plants which are feeding on people and animals. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

Lieutenant Doolittle, a former surfer from Malibu, has taken over as commander. The tedium of their work has driven the crew of Pinback, Boiler, and Talby "around the bend", so they have created distractions for themselves. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: Aliens send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth and absorb all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: A young boy discovers aliens from outer space have landed on Earth. hese aliens are from another world, and have plans for us earthlings. Duration: 7200
